unit.data.artificier.name: Artificier
unit.data.artificier.lore: Specialists of anything explosive, they have developed techniques retrofitting Mana into blasting devices. They are always keen on trying their devices on any kind of fortification.
unit.data.artificier.description.visuals: Small robotic looking creature, made of metal with blue glowing eyes. Wearing a purple wizard pointy hat. Holding a red magical tome in one hand and a purle glowing orb. A wooden cannon with golden trims hanging on his back. The background is showing multiple purple fireworks.
